name: csv
description: CSV parser with simple api, full of options and tested against large datasets.
author: David Worms <david@adaltas.com> (http://www.adaltas.com)

scripts.preversion: grep '## Trunk' CHANGELOG.md && rm -rf lib && npm run coffee
scripts.version: version=`grep '^  "version": ' package.json | sed 's/.*"\([0-9\.]*\)".*/\1/'` && sed -i "s/## Trunk/## Version $version/" CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
